1- Age Restrictions: Renters must be at least 21 years old and have a valid driver's license.
 2- Insurance: Renters must have liability insurance coverage or purchase the agency's insurance coverage.
 3- Driving Restrictions: Renters must obey all traffic laws and are not allowed to use the vehicle for illegal activities.
 4- Maintenance and Cleaning: Renters must return the vehicle in the same condition as it was received, including refueling the tank, and cleaning the interior and exterior.
 5- Damage and Loss: Renters are responsible for any damage or loss to the vehicle during the rental period.
 6- Fuel Policy: Renters must return the vehicle with the same fuel level as it was received, or a refueling fee will be charged.
 7- Late Returns: Renters must return the vehicle on the agreed upon return date and time, or a late fee will be charged.
 8- Mileage Limits: Renters may be subject to a per-mile charge if the mileage exceeds the agreed upon limit.
 9- Reservation Policy: Renters must provide a valid credit card to secure a reservation and may be required to pay a deposit or prepayment.
You must agree to Agency Rules
